RuleSet.Name: initdata/schemaname-secinit-cluster.xml
RuleSet.Descr: Java 25 XML Initialization Data for Cluster

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaSecInitClusterSaxLoaderFile
GenFile.ModuleName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$saxloader

RuleSet.GenFile: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <CFSec xmlns="uri://cfsec/cfsecloader" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:schemaLocation="uri://cfsec/cfsecloader file:/opt/$reference MinorVersion refernce ParentMajVer reference ParentSPrj reference ParentTPrj Name$/$reference MinorVersion reference ParentMajVer Name$.0.$reference MinorVersion Name$/cfsec-structured.xsd" > <Cluster FullDomName="system" Description="system"> <SecGroup Name="ClusterAdmin" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupMember User="system" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Admin" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="ClusterAdmin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Reader" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Creator" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Updater" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Deleter" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup>$iterate SchemaRefs( each SchemaSecInitClusterSaxLoaderFileDeclRefGroupAdmin empty empty )$$iterate SchemaTables( each maybeSchemaSecInitClusterSaxLoaderFileDeclTableGroups empty empty )$ </Cluster> </CFSec>
RuleSet.GenRule: <SecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="ClusterAdmin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Reader" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Creator" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Updater" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Deleter" IsVisible="true"> <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </SecGroup>

<SecGroup Name="Read$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Reader" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="Create$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Creator" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="Update$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Updater" /> </SecGroup> <SecGroup Name="Delete$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <SecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Deleter" /> </SecGroup>
